content: Cache la Poudra River and South Platte River, Colorado. “Swift Beef Co. and subsidiaries JBS USA, leading processors of beef and pork, are being sued for illegally dumping slaughterhouse pollution into Colorado waterways—press release, Center for Biological Diversity, 1-31-2019__no.0221, 2019. #watercontamination #industrialwaste #publichealth
